description: In all the cases where run_tests.sh receives an argument (i.e. the -N, -V, or -f arguments have been passed), it doesn't pass the remaining arguments to nosetest.  In particular, this means that you can't use these flags and at the same time specify a test suite to run.
title: run_tests.sh sometimes doesn't pass arguments to nosetest
